about_content: A web developer who has dream to build a self-made social network. Currently as a freelance and focused as a Back-End and Full Stack Web Developer. Apart from the Web, can build Desktop, Mobile and Internet of Thing (IOT) applications too. As Server Operating System, I use Ubuntu Server  and use Ubuntu Desktop for daily productivity. In every application development, I used to use Github for public projects and Gitlab for personal projects. I am happy with all new things, can use programming languages and technology as needed and can work in teams.
service_list:
• Building Web Application for All needed.
  • As Backend using PHP/Codeigniter/Laravel
  • Front-End with Bootstrap/JQuery/ReactJS
  • Mobile Apps dengan ReactNative/Android Studio
  • Software with VB.NET/Java
  • Program with Python and MATLAB
  • Can use Git in project collaboration.
  • Use Linux as main operating system
  • Etc.
call_me_contact_text: Please contact me via email refsisangkay@gmail.com, Phone Number or Whatsapp at 0896 9804 4151 (Call/SMS/WA/Telegram)
